        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2944</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vocabulary Games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz-Spiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux de Vocabulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos Do Vocabulário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi Di Vocabolario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια λεξιλογίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos Del Vocabulario</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an educational site with a large variety of interactive games , thorugh which to learn English Vocabulary</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine pädagogische Site mit einer 
großen Vielzahl der interaktiven Spiele, thorugh, das englischen 
Wortschatz erlernen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un site éducatif avec une grande variété 
de jeux interactifs, le thorugh qui pour apprendre le vocabulaire 
anglais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um local educacional com uma variedade 
grande de jogos interativos, o thorugh que para aprender o 
vocabulário inglês</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un luogo educativo con una grande varietà
di giochi interattivi, thorugh che imparare vocabolario inglese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια εκπαιδευτική περιοχή με μια μεγάλη 
ποικιλία των διαλογικών παιχνιδιών, thorugh που για να μάθει το
αγγλικό λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un sitio educativo con una variedad grande
de juegos interactivos, el thorugh que aprender vocabulario inglés</string>
